pages.text: Pewter spikes steal the physical feruchemical powers: $(p)Feruchemically storing and tapping $(l:cosmere:feruchemy/feruchemical_iron)Iron$(), $(l:cosmere:feruchemy/feruchemical_steel)Steel$(), $(l:cosmere:feruchemy/feruchemical_tin)Tin$() and $(l:cosmere:feruchemy/feruchemical_pewter)Pewter$(), the feruchemical attributes keyed to each of these are:  $(p)Weight(Slow Fall/Slowness, Resistance), Speed(Slowness/Speed), Senses(Blindness/Night Vision), and Strength(Weakness/Strength).
